actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: To prohibit States from carrying out certain law enforcement activities which have the effect of intimidating individuals from voting.
short_title: National Voter Anti-Intimidation Election Act of 2001
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: National Voter Anti-Intimidation Election Act of 2001 - Amends the Federal criminal code to provide for the treatment of certain law enforcement activities by State or local law enforcement officers on any Federal election day as interference with an election for Federal office.

titles.title: National Voter Anti-Intimidation Election Act of 2001
To prohibit States from carrying out certain law enforcement activities which have the effect of intimidating individuals from voting.
